statements: SELECT * FROM ecotourism_impact_data;
SELECT activity_name, location, impact_rating FROM ecotourism_impact_data;
SELECT id, activity_name, date FROM ecotourism_impact_data WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_impact_data WHERE location = 'Costa Rica';
SELECT id, location FROM ecotourism_impact_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_impact_data WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT activity_name, location, impact_rating FROM ecotourism_impact_data WHERE impact_rating > 3 ORDER BY impact_rating ASC
SELECT activity_name, location, date FROM ecotourism_impact_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_impact_data WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%' AND impact_rating >= 2 ORDER BY impact_rating DESC, location ASC
SELECT id, activity_name, location, impact_rating FROM ecotourism_impact_data WHERE activity_name != 'Hiking' ORDER BY location ASC, impact_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM EcotourismActivities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, location FROM EcotourismActivities WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM EcotourismActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT practice_name, goal_description FROM SustainabilityPractices;
SELECT practice_name, implementation_date FROM SustainabilityPractices WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EcotourismActivities WHERE impact_score > 50 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location, impact_score FROM EcotourismActivities WHERE location LIKE '%Forest%' OR location LIKE '%Mountains%' ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM EcotourismActivities WHERE activity_name IN ('Hiking', 'Bird Watching') AND impact_score < 30;
SELECT activity_name, location, activity_date FROM EcotourismActivities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT practice_name, goal_description FROM SustainabilityPractices WHERE implementation_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM ecotourism_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT guide_name, experience_level FROM tour_guides WHERE experience_level = 'Expert';
SELECT measure_name, description FROM sustainability_measures WHERE importance_rating > 8;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE location LIKE 'Mountain%';
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM ecotourism_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT guide_name, experience_level FROM tour_guides WHERE experience_level='Intermediate';
SELECT measure_name, description, importance_rating FROM sustainability_measures WHERE importance_rating > 5 ORDER BY measure_id ASC;
SELECT activity_name, location, environmental_impact FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE location='Forest Park' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_location, activity_date FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tour_name, duration_hours, cost FROM tours ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_content FROM sustainability_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_location FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE environmental_impact > 0.5 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;

SELECT participant_name, participant_age, activity_name, activity_location, report_content FROM participants JOIN ecotourism_activities ON participants.activity_id = ecotourism_activities.activity_id JOIN sustainability_reports ON participants.activity_id = sustainability_reports.activity_id WHERE participant_age >= 18;
SELECT tour_name, tour_guide, cost, duration_hours FROM tours WHERE cost < 1000 AND duration_hours > 3 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT AVG(cost) AS average_cost, MAX(duration_hours) AS max_duration FROM tours WHERE tour_location = 'Forest' OR tour_location = 'Mountain';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactData;
SELECT activity_name, location, impact_score FROM EnvironmentalImpactData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM EcotourismParticipants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT practice_name, recurring_event FROM SustainabilityPractices WHERE recurring_event = true;
SELECT season_name, temperature, precipitation, activity_count FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE activity_count > 100 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT id, activity_name, impact_score FROM EnvironmentalImpactData WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM EcotourismParticipants WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM SustainabilityPractices WHERE recurring_event = TRUE LIMIT 3;
SELECT season_name, temperature, precipitation FROM SeasonalTrends ORDER BY temperature DESC, precipitation ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT E.activity_name, P.participant_name, A.duration_minutes FROM EnvironmentalImpactData E JOIN ActivityLogs A ON E.id = A.activity_id JOIN EcotourismParticipants P ON A.participant_id = P.participant_id WHERE A.duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY A.duration_minutes DESC;
